mapper.update: update sscar set rote_id = #{roteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_orgin = #{carOrgin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_pro_date = #{carProDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_but_date = #{carButDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_capacity = #{carCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_state = #{carState,jdbcType=BIT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select car_id, rote_id, car_type, car_orgin, car_pro_date, car_but_date, car_capacity, car_state, comment from sscar where car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
